title: Companion Approval Guide
content: ing with Eight (child on the far eastern side of the goblin camp), Say "Sorry for your loss" after asking about a corpse. Intimidate or persuade Zarys in the Zhentarim hideout (i.e., tell her to stand down or say you don't want trouble) Say you want to buy Oskar the artist in the Zhentarim hideout (“Fine, I’ll buy him. How much?”) and then successfully persuade or intimidate his slaver (Brem) Allow Wyll to play "how would you kill the Blade" when talking to three goblins in the Shattered Sanctum
